description.narrative: IFC is considering investing in a one year pre-export facility for the Trans-Oil group of companies (the Group), a leading integrated agro-industrial group focused on grain origination, trading and oilseed crushing in Moldova. The facility will support the Groups commodities purchases, storage and processing for the 20142015 harvest season for sale to export markets (the Project). IFC is currently financing the Group through a long term loan used for capital expansion and investments. The facility may be renewed, and IFC may extend its investment, on an annual basis for two more years after the first-year investment

The development impact of the Project is expected to include (i) increased access to finance for a leading agricultural player operating in a key sector of the Moldovan economy, (ii) support of the Group''s growth and generation of higher export revenues, a major source of export income in Moldova, (iii) increased farmers reach by providing a sizable and stable source of financing for the Group''s purchase of commodities from mainly small and medium-sized farmers, and (iv) job preservation and increased tax revenues.
